fields_of_interest: Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
ZWE is involved in the development of plastic strategy and single use plastic legislation. We are also working on the transposition of the Circular Economy package, including waste package (waste framework directive, landfill directive, ecodesign, etc) but also product, energy and toxics & health policies. 
ZWE is also working on climate policies in the field of the internationals COPs, ESD, RED and NECD well as sustainable development goals. 
ZWE works on other issues as member of the international network GAIA but these activities don't fall under the register.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: ZWE is part of GAIA international and ZWIA.
goals__remit: ZWE is an European independent initiative bringing together organisations and municipalities committed to work to eliminate waste in Europe. ZWE is participating in the international organisation Global Alliance for Incinerator Alternatives (GAIA) and the Zero Waste International Alliance (ZWIA).
relevant_communication: In 2016 we carried out a range of activities such as: 35 conferences, 11 workshops, 2 plastic bag free day events, 15 press releases, 1 webinar, 21 blog posts, 2 public statement, 6 joint letters, 3 proposals for amendments, 5 case studies, 3 study tours of best practice, 6 policy briefs, 1 report,  25 social media posts, 1 video, participation in commission working group meetings, 1 campaigners meeting, 10 written EP questions, 17 meetings with MEPs, and regular coordination meetings with NGO and industry coalitions.  In order to implement the programmes three hires were made during the year (Product Policy Officer, Communications Officer and Network Development Coordinator).
